title: ReuseHub
shortDescription: • React (Vite) + Express/TypeScript backend with Postgres + Redis, Auth0 (social+DB), JWT, rate limits, Helmet/CORS hardening. • Geo feed/search with PostGIS-ready queries, image uploads, and race-safe claim/pickup workflow via transactional repos. • Eco-points ledger (value object), achievements, leaderboard, and Points UI with live balances + recent transactions. • Pluggable adapters for storage (local/S3), AI tagging (OpenAI/TensorFlow stub), maps (Google Maps), notifications (SendGrid); Docker Compose dev/prod parity.
